questions.question: What type of account do you need for Instagram as an entrepreneur?
If your answer to the above was 'Business', why?
options: A) It unlocks powerful features like audience insights and contact buttons
B) It allows you to post longer videos
C) It gives you access to exclusive Instagram filters

questions.question: If your answer was 'Creator', why?
options: A) It gives you ability to create videos in the app
B) It allows you to create ads and sponsorships
C) It allows you to use special filters

questions.question: Instagram Stories are important to business owners for these reasons, EXCEPT
options: A) They're perfect for sharing behind-the-scenes, fun content, or special offers
B) You can publish your stories to news platforms from your IG Story
C) Stories are a way to keep your followers engaged

questions.question: What is that new feature mentioned in the TikTok video that gives creators insight into topics people are searching for on TikTok?

Which of these apps are not under Meta?
Can you pay for Instagram ads using your Nigerian cards?
How many types of Instagram ads do we have?
